buyer.description: The receiver or buyer of the goods.

grossWeight.description: The total gross weight of all the goods. Usually mentioned as G.W or GW or Gross Weight, etc..

netWeight.description: The total net weight of all the goods. Usually mentioned as N.W or NW or Net Weight, etc..

seller.description: The seller or shipper of the goods.

containerNumber.description: Container Number consists of 4 capital letters followed by 7 digits. Example: TEMU7972458. Usually mentioned as Container Number, CONTAINER NO. or Containers

grossWeight.description: The gross weight of the goods. Usually mentioned as G.W or GW or Gross Weight, etc..

hsCode.description: The harmonized system code of a goods.

measurements.description: The volume of the goods. Usually, it is measured in 'Cubic Meter (cbm)' or dimensions. But volume in 'cbm' is preferred.

netWeight.description: The net weight of the goods. Usually mentioned as N.W or NW or Net Weight, etc..

packagingType.description: The packaging type is the unit of quantityShipped. Example; pallets, PLT, cartons, CTNS, pieces, PCS, packages, etc. Sometimes, the packaging type is available in the column name of the quantityShipped.

poPosition.description: PO position refers to the specific item or line associated with a Purchase Order (PO). It represents the position or line number in the PO that corresponds to the items being shipped.

quantityShipped.description: The quantity of the goods. Usually quantity is in pallets, PLT, cartons, CTNS, pieces, PCS, packages, boxes, etc. Please prioritize the packaging types based on their size, as follows: Pallets (PLT) >> Cartons (CTNS) >> Pieces (PCS). Extract the Larger packaging types that will have a lower count.

sealNumber.description: A unique number associated with the container number

totalPackagingType.description: The packaging type of all the goods associated with the totalQuantityShipped. It is the unit of totalQuantityShipped. Usually pallets, PLT, cartons, CTNS, pieces, PCS, packages, etc.

totalQuantityShipped.description: The total quantity of the goods. Usually quantity is in pallets, cartons, pieces, packages, boxes, etc. Please prioritize the packaging types based on their size, as follows: Pallets >> Cartons >> Pieces. Larger packaging types will have a lower count.
